survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Eco-Friendly Hotel Practices Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from hotel guests regarding their satisfaction with eco-friendly practices implemented by the hotel, such as energy conservation, waste reduction, and sustainable amenities.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the eco-friendly practices at our hotel?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the eco-friendly practices at our hotel?

questions.question_text: Which of the following eco-friendly practices did you notice during your stay? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify which practices are most visible to guests.

script.question_text: Which of the following eco-friendly practices did you notice during your stay? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to choose our hotel again because of its eco-friendly practices?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure likelihood of repeat business.

script.question_text: How likely are you to choose our hotel again because of its eco-friendly practices?

questions.question_text: Please share any suggestions for improving our eco-friendly practices.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: Please share any suggestions for improving our eco-friendly practices.

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a slightly higher rate for a hotel stay that includes more eco-friendly practices?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge willingness to pay for sustainability.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a slightly higher rate for a hotel stay that includes more eco-friendly practices?
